author: Suzannah Lyons And Olivia Willis
title: Can coronavirus linger in the air, even if someone leaves the room?
description: Is it possible for coronavirus to linger in the air? And can you catch it even after someone who is infected with it has left the room?
content:
By now, you (hopefully) know the drill: wash your hands, don't touch your face, and keep your distance from others.
COVID-19 the infectious disease caused by the new coronavirus is thought to be mostly spread via respiratory droplets, the secretions we gener… [+6244 chars]
